strapiPost.title: The Show Goes On
strapiPost.content:
Coming through an IG announcement yesterday, Bentonville natives Jenny and Dave Marrs are returning to HGTV for the 3rd season of their show, Fixer to Fabulous.

  • Work in progress: Season 3 is still being filmed, but it's already full of renovations that will have you planning your own home makeover.
  • A little extra: In addition to their new season, Fixer to Fabulous will be presenting a spin-off series called Welcome Inn. This new series follows the couple as they make an 1880s home into a "functioning vacation rental."

You can learn more about this fabulous couple HERE.
